docs.text: Chrome ¶ Installation ¶ Download Chrome ¶ wget https://dl.google.com/linux/direct/google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb Install Chrome ¶ sudo dpkg -i -y google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb
docs.title: Chrome

docs.text: wget https://dl.google.com/linux/direct/google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb
docs.title: Download Chrome

docs.text: sudo dpkg -i -y google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb
docs.title: Install Chrome

docs.text: Conky ¶ Installation ¶ Install Conky ¶ sudo add-apt-repository ppa:teejee2008/ppa sudo apt update sudo apt install -y conky-manager Setup Conky ¶
docs.title: Conky

docs.text: sudo add-apt-repository ppa:teejee2008/ppa sudo apt update sudo apt install -y conky-manager
docs.title: Install Conky

docs.text: Etcher ¶ Installation ¶ Add Repo to Sources & Add Repo Key ¶ sudo add-apt-repository "deb https://deb.etcher.io stable etcher" sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 379CE192D401AB61 Install Etcher ¶ sudo apt update sudo apt install -y balena-etcher-electron
docs.title: Etcher

docs.text: sudo add-apt-repository "deb https://deb.etcher.io stable etcher" sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 379CE192D401AB61
docs.title: Add Repo to Sources & Add Repo Key

docs.text: sudo apt update sudo apt install -y balena-etcher-electron
docs.title: Install Etcher

docs.text: Nord VPN ¶ Installation ¶ Download Nord VPN ¶ sudo wget -qnc https://repo.nordvpn.com/deb/nordvpn/debian/pool/main/nordvpn-release_1.0.0_all.deb Install Nord VPN ¶ sudo apt update sudo apt install -y nordvpn Setup Nord VPN ¶ Login ¶ nordvpn login Setup Settings ¶
docs.title: Nord VPN

docs.text: sudo wget -qnc https://repo.nordvpn.com/deb/nordvpn/debian/pool/main/nordvpn-release_1.0.0_all.deb
docs.title: Download Nord VPN

docs.text: sudo apt update sudo apt install -y nordvpn
docs.title: Install Nord VPN

docs.text: nordvpn login
docs.title: Login

docs.text: VMware ¶ Installation ¶ Install build packages ¶ sudo apt install build-essential Download VMware ¶ wget --user-agent = "Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:60.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/60.0" https://www.vmware.com/go/getplayer-linux Install VMware ¶ chmod +x getplayer-linux sudo ./getplayer-linux
docs.title: VMware

docs.text: sudo apt install build-essential
docs.title: Install build packages

docs.text: wget --user-agent = "Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:60.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/60.0" https://www.vmware.com/go/getplayer-linux
docs.title: Download VMware

docs.text: chmod +x getplayer-linux sudo ./getplayer-linux
docs.title: Install VMware

docs.text: Code ¶ Installation ¶ Import GPG Key & Add Repo to Sources ¶ wget -q https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc -O- | sudo apt-key add - sudo add-apt-repository "deb [arch=amd64] https://packages.microsoft.com/repos/vscode stable main" Install VS Code ¶ sudo apt update sudo apt install -y code
docs.title: VS Code

docs.text: wget -q https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc -O- | sudo apt-key add - sudo add-apt-repository "deb [arch=amd64] https://packages.microsoft.com/repos/vscode stable main"
docs.title: Import GPG Key & Add Repo to Sources

docs.text: sudo apt update sudo apt install -y code
docs.title: Install VS Code

docs.text: ZSH ¶ Installation ¶ Install Terminator ¶ sudo apt install -y terminator Install ZSH ¶ sudo apt install -y zsh Install Oh-My-ZSH ¶ sh -c " $( curl -fsSL https://raw.github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh/master/tools/install.sh ) " Setup Powerline Fonts ¶ sudo apt install -y fonts-powerline Install Solarized ¶ git clone git://github.com/sigurdga/gnome-terminal-colors-solarized.git ~/.solarized cd ~/.solarized ./install.sh
docs.title: ZSH

docs.text: sudo apt install -y terminator
docs.title: Install Terminator

docs.text: sudo apt install -y zsh
docs.title: Install ZSH

docs.text: sh -c " $( curl -fsSL https://raw.github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh/master/tools/install.sh ) "
docs.title: Install Oh-My-ZSH

docs.text: sudo apt install -y fonts-powerline
docs.title: Setup Powerline Fonts

docs.text: git clone git://github.com/sigurdga/gnome-terminal-colors-solarized.git ~/.solarized cd ~/.solarized ./install.sh
docs.title: Install Solarized
